notice.ch: 經組必修，法組必選修，請自行選課。

department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 經組必修，法組必選修，請自行選課。

goal.ch: 本課程的目標是結合產業理論與實證模型，以使學生學習如何利用實證分析來驗證相關的理論與產業現象。
goal.en: 本課程的目標是結合產業理論與實證模型, 以使學生學習如何利用實證分析來驗證相關的理論與產業現象.“

outline.ch:
Topics
1.2/21: Market Structure ＆ Entry and Exit
2.2/28: 和平紀念日放假1日
3.3/06: Structure-Conduct-Performance (SCP) Paradigm
4.3/13: New Empirical Industrial Organization (NEIO)
5.3/20: Price Discrimination
6.3/27: Firm Growth
7.4/03: 校際活動週停課1日
8.4/10: 期中考
9.4/17: R＆D, Innovation and Patent Licensing
10.4/24: Advertising
11.5/01: Horizontal Mergers
12.5/08: Vertical Relations and Constraints
13.5/15: Strategic Incumbents and Entry Strategies
14.5/22: 產經實證文章分組口頭報告(1)
15.5/29: 產經實證文章分組口頭報告(2)
16.6/05: 期末考
17.6/12: 彈性教學 (台灣產經實證-個人期末報告主題討論：視訊/電郵)
18.6/19: 彈性教學 (台灣產經實證-個人期末報告內容討論：視訊/電郵)
outline.en:
Topics
1.2/21: Market Structure ＆ Entry and Exit

textbook.ch:
“Required Textbooks:
Pepall, Lynne, Dan Richards and George Norman (2008), Industrial Organization: Contemporary Theory and Empirical Applications, fourth edition, Blackwell Publishing Ltd.
Tremblay, Victor J. and Carol Horton Tremblay (2012), New Perspectives in Industrial Organization: with Contributions from Behavioral Economics and Game Theory, Springer, New York.

Supplementary Readings:
Carlton, Dennis and Jeffrey Perloff (2005), Modern Industrial Organization, fourth edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley.
Waldman, Don E. and Elizabeth J. Jensen (2007), Industrial Organization: Theory and Practice, third edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley.“
textbook.en:
“Required Textbooks:
Pepall, Lynne, Dan Richards and George Norman (2008), Industrial Organization: Contemporary Theory and Empirical Applications, fourth edition, Blackwell Publishing Ltd.
Tremblay, Victor J. and Carol Horton Tremblay (2012), New Perspectives in Industrial Organization: with Contributions from Behavioral Economics and Game Theory, Springer, New York.

Supplementary Readings:
Carlton, Dennis and Jeffrey Perloff (2005), Modern Industrial Organization, fourth edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley.
Waldman, Don E. and Elizabeth J. Jensen (2007), Industrial Organization: Theory and Practice, third edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley.“

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討


其他

gradMethod.ch:
Course Requirement:  
1. Midterm exam (25％)
2. Final exam (30％)
3. Assignment (10％)
4. Oral presentation (10％)
5. Term report (20％)
6. Participation (5％)
gradMethod.en:
Course Requirement:  
1. Midterm exam (25％)
2. Final exam (30％)
3. Assignment (10％)
4. Oral presentation (10％)
5. Term report (20％)
6. Participation (5％)

flexDiscription.ch:
6/07: 彈性教學 (個人期末報告主題討論─以台灣產業為研究對象：視訊/電郵)
6/14: 彈性教學 (個人期末報告內容討論─以台灣產業為研究對象：視訊/電郵)

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

ch: 學制:限碩士班、博士班。學院:限管理學院。系所:限產業經濟研究所碩士班。指定課程:必須先修IE6001。
en: Type:Master's Program、Doctoral Program only.Faculty:College of Management only.Department:Master of Industrial Economics only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementIE6001 only.
